trans-unit.source: Defines the serialization context for WS-Trust messages.
A container for objects used to serialize WS-Trust requests (RST) and responses (RSTR).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustSerializationContext"></xref> class.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustSerializationContext"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollectionManager"></xref> object.

The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollectionManager"></xref> object that contains the set of <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler"></xref> objects to use for serializing and validating tokens found in WS-Trust messages.
securityTokenHandlerCollectionManager is .

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustSerializationContext"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollectionManager"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref>, and <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref> objects.

The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollectionManager"></xref> object that contains the set of <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler"></xref> objects to use for serializing and validating tokens found in WS-Trust messages.
The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref> object to use to resolve security token references found in most elements of WS-Trust messages.

The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref> object to use to resolve security token references found in the wst:UseKey element of RST messages as well as the wst:RenewTarget element found in RST messages.
securityTokenHandlerCollectionManager is .
-or- securityTokenResolver is .
-or- useKeyTokenResolver is .

Gets the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollectionManager"></xref> that contains the set of <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler"></xref> objects used for serializing and validating tokens found in WS-Trust messages.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollectionManager"></xref> object.
Gets or sets the collection of <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler"></xref> objects used to serialize and validate security tokens found in WS-Trust messages.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollection"></xref> object.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref> object used to resolve security token references found in most elements of WS-Trust messages.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref> object.

Gets or sets the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref> object used to resolve security token references found in the wst:UseKey element of RST messages as well as the wst:RenewTarget element found in RST messages.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref> object.
